full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR ZAB KHYAD CAN 'DI ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,RJE 'DREN MCHOG RNAM GSUM DBYER MED KYI BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BYIN RLABS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,RTZA BA'I BLA MA GANG MOS LA GSOL 'DEBS PO TI LNGA'I SMON LAM, DAM CAN CHOS SKYONG RNAM GSUM GYI 'PHRIN BCOL GNYER GTAD LAS KUN MYUR 'GRUB BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR ZAB KHYAD CAN 'DI NI, CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN POS, MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA LA GCIG BRGYUD KYI TSUL DU GNANG BA'O, ,)
